resources.string:
"Welcome to Chess PGN Base. 

The app comes with ten popular games preloaded. (Search with no parameters for the list). The next version will allow loading from the cloud. 
You can put PGNs in your clipboard to use with other applications, or use the embedded viewer. Swipe left, right, up, or down, or use the buttons to navigate.

Report bugs and bad PGNs to janjansz90210@gmail.com."
